metadata.Title: CVE-2016-1899 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
CRLF injection vulnerability in the ui-blob handler in CGit before 0.12 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary HTTP headers and conduct HTTP response splitting attacks or cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks via CRLF sequences in the mimetype parameter, as demonstrated by a request to blob/cgit.c.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-1899` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

cgit - 0.11.2.git2.3.2-1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cgit package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.11.2.git2.3.2-1.1').
